short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Viet Mechanical's tools for Marketing team

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for Viet Mechanical's Marketing team
This extension can:
- Enable user to copy, right click, and some lock key for end user.
- Append query to let GA filter out the internal traffics
- Easier to copy url and to admin page.

- update edit link for cokhiviet.net
